7.name: Eni-sensei
7.text:
"Well then. Since Sol has also grown, I will
rejoin as well. Please take care of me, Sol."

8.name: Sol
8.text:
"Ooooooh...!! If Sensei becomes a comrade, I'll
feel more at ease...!!"

9.name: Eni-sensei
9.text:
"I will make sure to confirm how much you have
grown. I'm looking forward to it."

12.name: Gustav
12.text: "I'm Gustav. A mercenary from a failed gunsmith."

13.name: Sol
13.text: "Hey, old dwarf! What's this iron tube?"

14.name: Gustav
14.text:
"This here is a cannon. It burns black gunpowder
and shoots out huge balls. It's like watching a
little girl breathe fire."

15.name: Sol
15.text:
"Ooooooh...! It feels like my loyal subject! I'm
starting to feel close to you!"

16.name: Gustav
16.text:
"Hmmm... I see. Let's name this one 'Dragon
Breath,' the fire-breathing dragon!"

19.name: Agni
19.text:
"My name is Agni. A warrior of the dragonkin. My
tribe serves dragons with scales the same color as
my eyes. I have been traveling in search of a
dragon with scales the same color as my eyes for a
long time."

20.name: Agni
20.text: "I shall serve you with golden scales."

21.name: Sol
21.text:
"Ooooooh... Mr. Lizardfolk...! Since we are both
of the same scale kin, let's get along!!"

24.name: Wayne
24.text:
"I'm Wayne. A war mage. Well, even though I'm
called a mage, I've only mastered attack spells.
Please think of me as a walking cannon or
ballista."

25.name: Sol
25.text:
"Ooooooh...! Amazing magician...! ...You're kind
of badass, huh??"

27.name: Seres
27.text:
"I am Serestine. I am the auditor of the
Adventurer's Guild... but today, I am accompanying
Wayne. Please treat us well."

28.name: Sol
28.text:
"Are you the elven auditor, my goodness! Ohhh...!
Such a beautiful person!! I look forward to
working with you!!!"

31.name: Drowken
31.text:
"I am Drowken, the Griffin Knight. I have answered
the call of gold and have arrived. This here is my
partner, Stoner. We look forward to working with
you."

33.name: Sol
33.text:
"Ooooooh...! The Griffin Rider! ...The griffin
itself is... quite powerful..."

36.name: Azusa
36.text:
"My name is Azusa. A samurai from the Dragon
Kingdom. Please take care of me."

37.name: Sol
37.text:
"Sa... Samurai...! I've never seen one before!
Amazing! I'm Sol! Please take care of me!!"

40.name: Trendil
40.text:
"I'm Trendil. An archer. I'm not used to the human
country, but I'll manage somehow. Nice to meet
you."

41.name: Sol
41.text:
"Nice to meet you! Elf big brother! ...You must be
hundreds of times older than me, right??"

44.name: Faria
44.text:
"I am Faria, a sister serving in Ishperel. Please
remember me. Lord Gold Dragon."
